heading: Our Super Shardians
description: Meet our Super Shardians. These are people who have gone above and beyond the call of duty to contribute to Shardeum. Our Super Shardians are spread across the globe and stand testament to Shardeumâ€™s OCC principles. Exciting rewards like crypto merchs, NFTs are awaiting them.
beASuperShardianDesc: You too can become a Super Shardian by joining our community today. All you need is passion and the drive to add value to Shardeum as a content creator, designer, marketer, translator, developer or in any way you can. The community has always got your back.
